meanings.definition: Short and thick in a way that is unattractive.
meanings.sent1: The bulldog had the stubbiest legs in the park.
meanings.sent2: The cactus had the stubbiest needles I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The stubbiest pencil in the box was too short to use.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was as stubbiest as a tree stump.
meanings.sent5: The stubbiest tree in the forest stood out among the tall pines.

meanings.definition: Having a short, thick tail or appendage.
meanings.sent1: The squirrel with the stubbiest tail was easy to spot.
meanings.sent2: The rabbit had the stubbiest little tail wagging happily.
meanings.sent3: The stubbiest tail on the cat made it look like a bobblehead.
meanings.sent4: His temper was as stubbiest as a lizard's tail.
meanings.sent5: The stubbiest tail on the kite made it spin in circles.

meanings.definition: Short and thick in a way that is unattractive.
meanings.sent1: The stubbiest fingers struggled to grasp the tiny button.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar had the stubbiest body among its siblings.
meanings.sent3: The stubbiest brush in the set was perfect for detail work.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as stubbiest as a broken record.
meanings.sent5: The stubbiest candle in the room barely flickered in the breeze.
